subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which of the following kings is considered as the founder of the Mewar Kingdom?
question_hi: मेवर क्षतिपूजा केंक से कौन से स्वामी केंक के रूप में मेवर क्षतिपूजा है।
explanation_en: Rana Pratap is considered as the founder of the Mewar kingdom.
explanation_hi: राना प्रतिप राजनी मेवर क्षतिप है।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous lake is located in Udaipur City?
question_hi: उदयपुर सिंग स्टिंग के विभाग मेवर विभाग है।
explanation_en: Udaipur City, also known as Udaipur, is the capital city of the Mewar division in Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: उदयपुर सिंग स्टिंग, राजस्थान के मेवर विभाग के विभाग की मौंग स्टिंग

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which Rajput king was known for organizing the Battle of Haldighati?
question_hi: राज्यका राजपुत कांग को हाल्डिगीटाटी के संघे मौंग को मैंगको भैयलवाल को हल्डिगीटाटी मैंगको भैयलवाल
explanation_en: Pratap Singh is known for organizing the Battle of Haldighati, while Rao Jodhraj, Rana Kumbha, and Pratap Singh are related to the history of Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: प्रताप सिंग को हालदीग्ती को को हालदीग्तिगतिगती

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which ruler was the founder of the Udaipur State?
explanation_en:
Pratap Singh is regarded as the founder of Udaipur State, also known as Mewar State.
Rana Pratap and Rana Pratap are two alternate names for the same ruler
explanation_hi: प्रताप उदयंग सिंग म्रान उदयंग सिंग

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which city was the capital of Mewar State during the rule of Maharana Pratap?
